item.title: Making wild areas
item.dc:creator: @Server_Creator_Brian Server Creator Brian
item.description:
@Server_Creator_Brian wrote:

Is the area a safe zone right now?

If so…

  1. Open up client.java
  2. Search for public boolean nonWild
  3. Find the safe zone’s co ords
  4. Delete them or change them

and it should be the wild again

Read full topic

item.title: Making wild areas
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

Well ive been working on a new pk area and when i added the coord to the player.java isinwild and then i compiled and restarted server. I still was unable to attack.

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 1) { if (absX >= 3090 && absX >= 3959 && absY >= 9098 && absY <=9132 || (coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715 && [b]coordY <= 2505 && coordY <= 3874)[/b] { return true; } } else if (Type == 2) { if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942) && (coordX >= 3090) && (coordY >= 3959) && [b](coordY <= 2505) && (coordY <= 3874)[/b] ) { return true; } }

Bold is the new coords. I also want the wild to be multi (not single) so you can team on people.

Thanks

Read full topic
